scripts.backend:makemigrations: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py makemigrations'
scripts.backend:migrate: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py migrate'
scripts.backend:create-superuser: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py createsuperuser'
scripts.backend:import-test-data: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py loaddata test-data.yaml'
scripts.backend:makemessages: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py makemessages --all'
scripts.backend:compilemessages: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'python manage.py compilemessages'
scripts.backend:lint: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'flake8 . && pylint *.py config/ skole/'
scripts.backend:format: docker-compose run --no-deps --rm backend sh -c 'autoflake --recursive --in-place --remove-all-unused-imports --ignore-init-module-imports . && isort . && docformatter --recursive --in-place --wrap-summaries=88 --wrap-descriptions=88 --pre-summary-newline . && black . && python manage.py graphql_schema'
